Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 36 (dexterity (4 max); trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Dagger (+28 1d6+4 P/S R10'); Glaive (+26 1d10+4 S [Crit +d8]); Staff (+28 1d6+4 B [2h d8])
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Armor Trained (Light Armor)
Cloistered Cleric: Weapon Expert (Glaive; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Deadly Simplicity: +1 damage die step on Glaive
Deity: Weapon Trained (Glaive)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Divine Defense: Armor Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Extend Armament Alignment: Increased Align Armament effects
Incredible Initiative: +2 Initiative
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Warpriest: Armor Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Weapon Trained (Martial Weapons)Weapon Expert (Glaive; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Align Armament: May touch a weapon to have it inflict +1d6 HP alignment for 1 min
Channel Smite: May use 2 actions to add the effects of a heal or harm spell to a melee Strike
Cloistered Cleric: May use critical specialization effects of Glaive
Incredible Improvisation: May add +4 to an untrained skill check 1/dy
Replenishment Of War: Successful Strike with Glaive gives self 10 temporary HP for 1 rd (critical hit 20 temporary HP) for 1 rd
Shared Replenishment: May give temporary HP from Replenishment Of War to an ally
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Warpriest: May use critical specialization effects of Glaive
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Cloistered Cleric: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Master (Fortitude)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats/Success vs. inhaled threat is always a critical success
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. ongoing disease or poison reduces stage by 2 (1 if virulent; 3 or 2 with critical success)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Warpriest: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 5; D10: 2; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; D7: 3; D8: 3; D9: 5 Focus Points: 5 Attack: Divine: +33 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 41 (wisdom; legendary)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Domain (Chaotic): Knows 1 advanced domain spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Domain (Evil): Knows 1 advanced domain spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Domain (Good): Knows 1 advanced domain spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced Domain (Lawful): Knows 1 advanced domain spell/+1 Focus Points
Cloistered Cleric: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Domain Initiate: Knows 1 domain spell/Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Harmful Font: +1 D9 slot
Healing Font: +1 D9 slot
Maker Of Miracles: +1 10th level spell slot
Miraculous Spell: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Warpriest: Spell Master (Divine)
Avatar's Audience: May speak for deity, Commune without cost, and Plane Shift to deity 1/dy
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each dy
Cast Down: May cast a harm or heal spell that inflicts damage also inflict knocked prone (target critical fail also inflicts -10' Speed for 1 min)
Castigating Weapon: Damaging a fiend with a heal spell gives self weapons bonus good damage vs. fiends equal to half the spell level for 1 rd
Channeled Succor: May cast Remove Curse, Remove Disease, Remove Paralysis, or Restoration in place of a prepared heal spell
Command Undead: May use a harm spell to control undead up to level 17 for 1 min (Will neg; critical failure extends to 1 hr)
Communal Healing: Casting a heal spell on another creature restores HP to self equal to spell level
Cremate Undead: Heal spell cast upon undead inflicts fire damage equal to spell level
Defensive Recovery: May use a heal spell to also give +2 AC and saves for 1 rd
Deity's Protection: Casting a domain spell gives self resistance equal to the spell level to all damage for 1 rd
Deity: Has access to Color Spray, Enthrall, Creation spells
Directed Channel: May cast an area harm or heal spell in a 60' cone
Divine Spellcasting: May learn spells from the Divine tradition
Divine Weapon: Casting a spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP force or +1d6 HP alignment until end of turn
Domain Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Domain Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Echoing Channel: May have a 2-action harm or heal spell also cause 1-action effects on an adjacent creature
Emblazon Antimagic: May use Emblazon Armament on a shield to allow Shield Block vs. spells or on a weapon to have a critical hit also counteract a spell using 1/2 the wielder's level
Emblazon Armament: 10 min process gives target shield +1 Hardness or weapon +1 HP damage
Emblazon Energy: May use Emblazon Armament on a shield to give a save bonus and Shield Block vs. chosen energy type; having a matching domain spell also gives it +10 resistance; may use on a weapon gives it +1d4 HP chosen energy type (+1d6 with matching domain spell)
Eternal Bane: R15' Surrounded by continuous level 10 Bane effects
Eternal Blessing: R15' Surrounded by continuous level 10 Bless effects
Fast Channel: May use 2 actions to cast a 3-action harm or heal spell
Harming Hands: Harm spells die types increase to d10
Healing Hands: Heal spells die types increase to d10
Heroic Recovery: Single-target heal spell also gives +5' Speed, +1 attack, and +1 HP damage for 1 rd
Holy Castigation: May use heal spells to damage fiends
Improved Command Undead: Target success/failure/critical failure vs. Command Undead gives self control for 1 rd/10 min/24 hr
Improved Communal Healing: May give additional HP from Communal Healing to another
Improved Swift Banishment: May sacrifice a 5th level or higher prepared spell to inflict Swift Banishment with a -2 save penalty
Metamagic Channel: May freely apply 1 metamagic action to harm and heal spells
Necrotic Infusion: Harm spells cast on an undead allow target to inflict +1d6 HP (5th level spell 2d6; 8th level 8d6) with first melee Strike in next rd
Reach Spell: May extend spell range by 30'
Resurrectionist: Restoring HP to a dying or dead target also gives fast healing 5 for 1 min
Sap Life: Casting a harm spell on another creature restores HP to self equal to spell level
Selective Energy: May choose 4 creatures to be unaffected when casting area harm or heal spell
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Swift Banishment: May use a Reaction to cast Banishment with a critical hit
Turn Undead: Critical failure by undead damaged by a heal spell inflicts fleeing for 1 rd
Versatile Font: May use font slot to prepare either a harm or a heal spell
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Domain (Chaotic) Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 8, domain initiate feature (currently 1) and deity alignment (currently NG) matches 'C'
Advanced Domain (Evil) Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 8, domain initiate feature (currently 1) and deity alignment (currently NG) matches 'E'
Advanced Domain (Lawful) Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 8, domain initiate feature (currently 1) and deity alignment (currently NG) matches 'L'
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 49 allocated
Command Undead Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 4, harmful font feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Neutral Good) matches 'Evil'
Deadly Simplicity Feat: Requires deity weapon category (currently Martial) matches 'Simple|Unarmed'
Eternal Bane Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 16 and alignment (currently Neutral Good) matches 'Evil'
General Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 4 allocated
Improved Command Undead Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 10, harmful font feature (currently 1), command undead feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Neutral Good) matches 'Evil'
Necrotic Infusion Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 4, harmful font feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Neutral Good) matches 'Evil'
